metadata.Title: CVE-2022-38178 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: By spoofing the target resolver with responses that have a malformed EdDSAsignature, an attacker can trigger a small memory leak. It is possible togradually erode available memory to the point where named crashes for lackof resources.

criterions.comment: bind9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
